originalText.text: We had an amazing time on our Manhattan Walking Tour, specifically the Hell's Kitchen food experience with the additional Central Park tour. There was a ton of food stops and we definitely left stuffed. Cale was an excellent guide and really helped paint the picture of the area's history. I've been on many walking tour across the country, and this was a highlight for sure. We booked through Viator, but I imagine it's possible to book multiple ways. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Cale was the most awesome tour guide for the Hells Kitchen walking food tour in NYC. Enjoyed a dreary day eating our way through 5 stops and learning a bit of history.

text.text: Cale was the most awesome tour guide for the Hells Kitchen walking food tour in NYC. Enjoyed a dreary day eating our way through 5 stops and learning a bit of history.

originalText.text:
We were incredibly fortunate to have what turned out to be an unexpectedly private food and Central Park tour. Our guide, Alex, was incredibly accommodating, even when we faced delays due to traffic and forgot to mention our dietary restrictions. Alex is an absolute gem, truly passionate about providing this tour, and their knowledge of New York and its history is impressive. Time flew by with Alex as our guide! Alex also takes amazing pictures :)

The food tastings were a real treat, and Central Park's beauty left us in awe (it's massive!). The portion sizes were perfect, and I must admit, I usually find tours a bit dull, but Alex's personal touch made it engaging and enjoyable. I highly recommend this tour – it's a must-do in NYC!

Cheers to Alex and the unforgettable experience!

originalText.text:
This is a big shout out to Manhattan Walking Tour and specifically our guide Jonathan H. My wife and I did this tour with Jonathan along with two other people on the last full day of our visit and recommend to anyone considering this tour to do it early in your visit. There is a lot to see and do on this tour from beginning to end. Walking the Highline offered many views and Jonathan's stories and historical perspectives really added to the experience. Plenty of vintage and contemporary architecture on that part of the trip. The food stops in Greenwich were great. Top shelf favorite food stop was Bleecker Street Pizza. Our absolute favorite thing about this tour was strolling through the West Village neighborhoods. Personally, I wish we had more time in those areas. The Jazz clubs are calling. Would loved to have stepped into Aurthur's Tavern or The Blue Note. Do this tour near the beginning of your trip. We did it on our last day. Just amazing...we will return to this amazing city.
Thank you Jonathan H. and Manhattan Walking Tour
Graham and Shanta from Kamloops BC, Canada

originalText.text: Awesome food tour of Hell’s Kitchen! Cale was a great tour guide & very knowledgeable about the history of NYC & the restaurants. We will definitely be booking with this company again when we return!

text.text: Awesome food tour of Hell’s Kitchen! Cale was a great tour guide & very knowledgeable about the history of NYC & the restaurants. We will definitely be booking with this company again when we return!
